name: post_terms_of_services
description:
Creates a terms of service for a given enterprise
and type of user.

status.description: Whether this terms of service is active.

text.description:
The terms of service text to display to users.

The text can be set to empty if the `status` is set to `disabled`.
text.example: By collaborating on this file you are accepting...

tos_type.description:
The type of user to set the terms of
service for.

$block:
A task allows for file-centric workflows within Box. Users can
create tasks on files and assign them to other users for them to complete the
tasks.

$ul: **action**: The type of task the task assignee will be prompted to
**completion_rule**: Defines which assignees need to complete this task before the task
**created_at**: When the task object was created
**id**: The unique identifier for this task
**is_completed**: Whether the task has been completed
**message**: A message that will be included with the task
**context_info**: A free-form object that contains additional context
**help_url**: A URL that links to more information about why this error occurred.
**message**: A short message describing the error.
**request_id**: A unique identifier for this response, which can be used
**status**: The HTTP status of the response.
